Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_TemplateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_TemplateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_TemplateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_from_Template_Data.description: Reference to an existing Ad hoc Payment Template

validation.validation: You must select an approved Ad Hoc Payment Template that is not in progress.
validation.description: You must select an approved Ad Hoc Payment Template that is not in progress.

validation.validation: You must select an active Ad Hoc Payment Template.
validation.description: You must select an active Ad Hoc Payment Template.

validation.validation: You cannot take this action because you do not have access to the Bank Account referenced in this Ad Hoc Payment Template.
validation.description: You cannot take this action because you do not have access to the Bank Account referenced in this Ad Hoc Payment Template.

validation.validation: The ID is already in use by an Ad Hoc Payment.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_from_Template_Data.description: This is the amount for the Ad Hoc Payment line.

validation.validation: If there are Freight Charges, then there must be at least one line with a Spend Category that has Allocate Freight.
Enter a positive Freight Amount value.
If there are Other Charges, then there must be at least one line with a Spend Category that has Allocate Other Charges.
validation.description: If there are Other Charges, then there must be at least one line with a Spend Category that has Allocate Other Charges.

validation.validation: Enter a positive Other Charges value.
The Document Link URL entered does not comply with URL restrictions set for this Field.

Financials_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Encoding of the Attachment.
Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

Ad_Hoc_Payment_from_Template_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing all Business Document Attachment data.

validation.validation: If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.

description: The data used to create an Ad Hoc Payment from Template.

validation.validation: External Link validation for Ad Hoc Payment Document Link must be set before a Document Link can be entered.
